data.message: The website on the insert I have for a multi pack is coke.co.uk/summer, but when I go to that URL there seems to be no way to enter the code, only the codes that are linked to bottles? Can you help please? Thanks

replies.message: Hi Sandra, we're sorry to hear you've been having trouble trying to enter your code. You select your dream destination first and and then follow the steps on the website to be able to enter your code. If you need anymore help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) 9am - 6pm. Thanks
